thread.title: Atlanta zoo names cockroach after Tom Brady
thread.title_full: Atlanta zoo names cockroach after Tom Brady

title: Atlanta zoo names cockroach after Tom Brady

organizations.name: roger williams park zoo & carousel village

text:
Atlanta zoo names cockroach after Tom Brady Atlanta zoo names cockroach after Tom Brady Atlanta zoo names cockroach after Tom Brady By Tim Weaver February 14, 2017 8:24 am 101 shares email By: Tim Weaver | February 14, 2017 8:24 am 
Nobody likes losing a Super Bowl bet, but being a good sport and paying up is part of being an adult. 
But making good on your bet while trolling the winner at the same time is a special skill. Even though the Atlanta Falcons blew a 25-point lead to the New England Patriots, you can take some comfort in this master-level trolling by Zoo Atlanta. 
Before Super Bowl LI, the zoo made a bet with the Roger Williams Park Zoo & Carousel Village that the losing side would name one of their baby animals after the other team’s quarterback. 
Zoo Atlanta’s choice? An adorable Madagascar hissing cockroach. Say hello to little Tom Brady! A post shared by Zoo Atlanta (@zooatl) on Feb 13, 2017 at 10:14am PST 
Savage.
